original: chos kyi ngo bo la ltos nas ni rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: chos kyi ngo bo la ltos nas ni rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya'o //
translated: In relation to the nature of phenomena, it is said to be ‚Äúmanifold.‚Äù

original: dngos po'i ngo bo la ltos nas ni mang por gyur pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po'i ngo bo la ltos nas ni mang por gyur pa zhes bya'o //
translated: In relation to the nature of things, it is said to be ‚Äúnumerous.‚Äù

original: de ltar chos gcig phu nyid kyi ngo bo nyid du ma'i bdag nyid 'thob par 'gyur ba ni sna tshogs par brjod pa'i phyir te yul dang dus kyi dbye ba mang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar chos gcig phu nyid kyi ngo bo nyid du ma'i bdag nyid 'thob par 'gyur ba ni sna tshogs par brjod pa'i phyir te yul dang dus kyi dbye ba mang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, in the nature of a single phenomenon, there is the attainment of the nature of many, because of the manifold expressions, due to the multitude of distinctions of place and time.

original: dngos po gcig nyid la dus kyi khyad par gyi dbang gis brjod pa sna tshogs mang po 'jug par 'gyur te /
analyzed: dngos po gcig nyid la dus kyi khyad par gyi dbang gis brjod pa sna tshogs mang po 'jug par 'gyur te /
translated: In a single thing, there is the engagement of many manifold expressions due to the power of distinctions of time.

original: skye bo de dang de dag la nges pa'i tshig mang po'i rnam grangs kyi dge ba'i dbang gis 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: skye bo de dang de dag la nges pa'i tshig mang po'i rnam grangs kyi dge ba'i dbang gis 'jug pa'o //
translated: Due to the power of the many synonyms of the words of the people, there is engagement.

original: gal te gzhan dag na re mang po dag gis brjod par bya ba yin na yang rjod par byed pa gcig gis de'i ngo bo nges par gzung ba dang / gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te gzhan dag na re mang po dag gis brjod par bya ba yin na yang rjod par byed pa gcig gis de'i ngo bo nges par gzung ba dang / gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
translated: If others say that even though many people can express it, one person who expresses it definitely apprehends its nature, but others do not,

original: @68a * // de'i phyir smras pa /
analyzed: @68a * // de'i phyir smras pa /
translated: then in response to that, it is said:

original: 'dogs pa'i tshig lhag ma gzhan dag ni ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'dogs pa'i tshig lhag ma gzhan dag ni ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúThe remaining terms of designation are not like that.‚ÄùüîΩIn this way, there is no definite observation at all of a single expression that expresses a thing.

original: 'di ltar btags pa'i brjod pa gcig gis dngos po mngon par rjod par byed pa'i nges pa ni ci yang mi dmigs te zhes bya ba ni gang yang rung ba cig gis dngos po rjod par byed pa na de'i bdag nyid du gyur gyi gzhan dag gis ma
analyzed: 'di ltar btags pa'i brjod pa gcig gis dngos po mngon par rjod par byed pa'i nges pa ni ci yang mi dmigs te zhes bya ba ni gang yang rung ba cig gis dngos po rjod par byed pa na de'i bdag nyid du gyur gyi gzhan dag gis ma
translated: This means that when any one person expresses a thing, it becomes that person‚Äôs nature, but it is not the nature of others.

original: yin zhes bya ba'i nges pa ni ci yang med pa ste /
analyzed: yin zhes bya ba'i nges pa ni ci yang med pa ste /

original: rgyu'i khyad par med pa'i phyir thams cad kyang de'i ngo bo nyid dang / de'i rang bzhin 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu'i khyad par med pa'i phyir thams cad kyang de'i ngo bo nyid dang / de'i rang bzhin 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because there is no difference in cause, all of them would obtain that nature and that essence.

original: de ltar byas na du ma'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba'i skyon bsal bar dka' ba nyid yin no ;
analyzed: de ltar byas na du ma'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba'i skyon bsal bar dka' ba nyid yin no ;

original: / yang gzhan dag dang ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: / yang gzhan dag dang ni ma yin no zhe na /

original: gcig dang yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gcig dang yang ma yin te /

original: rgyu la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //

original: des na smras pa /
analyzed: des na smras pa /

analyzed: de bas na btags pa'i tshig thams cad ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Thus, all words are designations, etc.

original: de lta na ni re zhig rnam par rtog pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na ni re zhig rnam par rtog pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, first of all, the conceptualization is twofold.

original: brjod pa mang po'i bdag nyid yin pas de yang du mar 'gyur te /
analyzed: brjod pa mang po'i bdag nyid yin pas de yang du mar 'gyur te /
translated: And it is a multiplicity because it has the nature of many expressions,

analyzed: brjod pa thams cad de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because all expressions are its nature.

original: yang na gcig kyang de'i rang bzhin du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: yang na gcig kyang de'i rang bzhin du mi 'gyur te /
translated: Or, even one is not its nature,

original: gcig nyid kyi ngo bo yin pa'i nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig nyid kyi ngo bo yin pa'i nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no certainty that it is the nature of one.üîΩMoreover, it is said:

original: gzhan yang gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni nyes pa mang po gzhan yang bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni nyes pa mang po gzhan yang bstan pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: dngos po sngar byung la zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten thog ma med pa'i dus nas sngon du byung bar gyur te chos rnams rtag tu rnam par gnas pa'i phyi nas sems can gyi 'jig rten byung zhing /
translated: ‚ÄúThings that existed previously‚Äù means that things have existed since beginningless time, and the world of sentient beings has always existed.

original: de dag la ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'dun pas tha snyad du btags pas nye bar rjod par byed do //
analyzed: de dag la ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'dun pas tha snyad du btags pas nye bar rjod par byed do //
translated: Later, the world of sentient beings came into being, and they are designated by the terms that people desire.

original: de ltar sngon du dngos po byung la phyi nas ni tshig gis nye bar 'dogs par byed do //
analyzed: de ltar sngon du dngos po byung la phyi nas ni tshig gis nye bar 'dogs par byed do //
translated: Thus, things existed previously, and later they are designated by terms.

original: de ltar byas na 'dogs pa ma byas pa'i snga rol na ste /üîΩ'dogs pa'i tshig gis nye bar ma btags pa'i tshe dngos po des de'i ngo bo mi thob ste /
analyzed: de ltar byas na 'dogs pa ma byas pa'i snga rol na ste / 'dogs pa'i tshig gis nye bar ma btags pa'i tshe dngos po des de'i ngo bo mi thob ste /
translated: If that were the case, then prior to being designated,üîΩthat thing would not obtain its nature.

original: de'i tshe 'dogs pa'i tshig gis nye bar btags pa med pa'i phyir btags pa'i bdag nyid can gyi dngos po'i ngo bo rnams /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'dogs pa'i tshig gis nye bar btags pa med pa'i phyir btags pa'i bdag nyid can gyi dngos po'i ngo bo rnams /

original: dngos po med pa nyid du grub pa yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa nyid du grub pa yin no //

original: dngos po'i ngo bo las ma gtogs pa'i chos 'jug pa ni yod pa ma yin pas de ni 'dod pa ma yin no zhes byas nas /
analyzed: dngos po'i ngo bo las ma gtogs pa'i chos 'jug pa ni yod pa ma yin pas de ni 'dod pa ma yin no zhes byas nas /
translated: Since there is no phenomenon that is not included within the nature of entities, this is unacceptable.

original: sngar dngos po med par gyur na ni /
analyzed: sngar dngos po med par gyur na ni /
translated: If it were nonexistent previously,

original: nye bar btags pa yang med par @68b 'gyur bas de'i phyir de'i bdag nyid yin pas nye bar 'dogs pa'i tshig med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: nye bar btags pa yang med par @68b 'gyur bas de'i phyir de'i bdag nyid yin pas nye bar 'dogs pa'i tshig med pa'i phyir /
translated: then the designation would also be nonexistent. Therefore, because it is of that nature, the term ‚Äúdesignation‚Äù would not exist.

original: chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes rnam par gzhag pa rigs so //
analyzed: chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes rnam par gzhag pa rigs so //
translated: Thus, it is reasonable to posit that all phenomena are inexpressible by nature.

original: de ltar sngar dngos po med pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i nyes par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar sngar dngos po med pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i nyes par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, the fault of becoming nonexistent previously would ensue.

original: de lta bu'i skyon spangs pa'i phyir sngon nas de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid yin no zhes smras na /
analyzed: de lta bu'i skyon spangs pa'i phyir sngon nas de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid yin no zhes smras na /
translated: In order to avoid such a fault, one might say that it is of that nature from the beginning.

original: de'i phyogs la skyon gzhan yod par bstan pa'i phyir smras pa /
analyzed: de'i phyogs la skyon gzhan yod par bstan pa'i phyir smras pa /
translated: To demonstrate that there are other faults in that position, it is said:

original: gal te 'dogs pa'i tshig ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: gal te 'dogs pa'i tshig ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: If it is said that the term ‚Äúdesignation‚Äù

original: sngar gzugs kyi mtshan nyid yin la /
analyzed: sngar gzugs kyi mtshan nyid yin la /
translated: refers to the nature of form,üîΩand form is the basis of the term ‚Äúdesignation,‚Äù

original: phyis nye bar 'dogs pa'i tshig yin no zhe na /
analyzed: phyis nye bar 'dogs pa'i tshig yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the word is applied later,

original: de lta na med kyang 'byung ba'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na med kyang 'byung ba'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then the error of arising without a cause would follow.

original: med kyang 'byung bar 'gyur na ni brjod bya dang / brjod pa'i 'brel pa nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: med kyang 'byung bar 'gyur na ni brjod bya dang / brjod pa'i 'brel pa nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it arose without a cause, the connection between the object and the expression would be lost.

original: de med na nye bar 'dogs pa'i tshig gis 'dogs pa med kyang dngos po de'i blo skye bar 'gyur na de ltar skye ba ni med do //
analyzed: de med na nye bar 'dogs pa'i tshig gis 'dogs pa med kyang dngos po de'i blo skye bar 'gyur na de ltar skye ba ni med do //
translated: If it arose without the application of the word, then the cognition of that thing would arise even without the application of the word. But that does not happen.

original: de'i phyir sngar nas gzugs kyi bdag nyid yin par rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir sngar nas gzugs kyi bdag nyid yin par rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not reasonable that it exists as the nature of form from the beginning.

original: de ltar na skyon gsum dang ldan par 'gyur bas chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i ngo bo nyid du khong du chud par bya'o zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na skyon gsum dang ldan par 'gyur bas chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i ngo bo nyid du khong du chud par bya'o zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: Thus, since it would have three faults, one should understand that all things are of the nature of inexpressibility.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba la sogs pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du yang nye bar btags pa'i tshig gis bsdus par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba la sogs pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du yang nye bar btags pa'i tshig gis bsdus par rig par bya'o //

analyzed: gnyis pa dngos po med pa la mngon par zhen pa'i phyogs kyi nyes pa yang gsal por bstan par bya ba'i phyir /

analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i chos 'di gnyis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

original: spangs pa 'thob par byed pas 'dul ba'o //
analyzed: spangs pa 'thob par byed pas 'dul ba'o //

original: de ltar ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i sgrub pa ni ye shes dang / spangs pa rab tu phye ba dang / lam dang 'bras bus rab tu phye bar gsal por bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i sgrub pa ni ye shes dang / spangs pa rab tu phye ba dang / lam dang 'bras bus rab tu phye bar gsal por bstan par 'gyur ro //
