original: gzhan du ni dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan te /
analyzed: gzhan du ni dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan te /
translated: But rather, it is a counterfeit of the true Dharma,

original: de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa'o zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa'o zhes bya ba'o //
translated: and it is adverse to it.

original: yongs su shes pa ni yongs su gcod pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su shes pa ni yongs su gcod pa'o //

original: de bzhin du gzhan dag la smra ba ni ston pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan dag la smra ba ni ston pa'o //

original: de ltar yongs su shes nas spong ba ni bsal ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar yongs su shes nas spong ba ni bsal ba'o //

original: de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs gzhan gyis smras pa /
analyzed: de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs gzhan gyis smras pa /
translated: The resistances are the other side of that.

original: sun 'byin pa ni bya ba bzhi ba'o //
analyzed: sun 'byin pa ni bya ba bzhi ba'o //

original: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pas mi 'phrogs pa'i sbyor ba mi 'dor bas brtson 'grus brtan pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / smon lam brtan po dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pas mi 'phrogs pa'i sbyor ba mi 'dor bas brtson 'grus brtan pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / smon lam brtan po dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the stability of his effort, he does not abandon the practice of not being carried away by others, and because of the stability of his vow.

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba thams cad 'di dag gi khongs su gtogs pa'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir smras pa /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba gang ci yang rung ba de dag ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Whatever the bodhisattva's activities are, etc.

original: de kho na nyid bzhi po 'di dag ni dman pa dang / 'bring dang / mchog tu rnam par gzhag pa bstan pa'i phyir smras pa /
analyzed: de kho na nyid bzhi po 'di dag ni dman pa dang / 'bring dang / mchog tu rnam par gzhag pa bstan pa'i phyir smras pa /
translated: In order to demonstrate that these four realities are inferior, middling, and superior, he says:

original: gnyis ni tha ma ste /
analyzed: gnyis ni tha ma ste /
translated: Two are inferior,

original: 'jig rten pa'i shes pa'i spyod yul yin pa'i phyir dang / nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po'i phyogs ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i shes pa'i spyod yul yin pa'i phyir dang / nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po'i phyogs ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are the domain of mundane knowledge and because they are not the side of the antidotes to the obscurations of the afflictions and the knowable.

original: 'bring po ni /
analyzed: 'bring po ni /
translated: The middling one

original: zag pa med pa'i phyir dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i phyir dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is not subject to contamination and is the antidote to the obscurations of the afflictions.

original: sgrib pa gnyi ga'i gnyen po'i phyogs yin pa'i phyir bzhi pa ni mchog yin no //üîΩbyang chub sems dpa'i sa las /
analyzed: sgrib pa gnyi ga'i gnyen po'i phyogs yin pa'i phyir bzhi pa ni mchog yin no // byang chub sems dpa'i sa las /
translated: The fourth is superior because it is the side of the antidote to both obscurations.

original: de kho na nyid kyi don gyi le'u bshad pa ste bzhi pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi don gyi le'u bshad pa ste bzhi pa rdzogs so /
translated: This concludes the explanation of the fourth chapter, on the meaning of reality, in the Treatise on the Pith Instructions on Praj√±ƒÅpƒÅramitƒÅ, Called The Ornament of Clear Realization.

original: // / de kho na'i don mthong pa ni nyon mongs pa med par 'gyur bas skyo ba med pa'i thabs rnyed par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar de'i rjes la mthu bstan par bya'o //üîΩsangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mthu ni bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur te /
analyzed: // / de kho na'i don mthong pa ni nyon mongs pa med par 'gyur bas skyo ba med pa'i thabs rnyed par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar de'i rjes la mthu bstan par bya'o // sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mthu ni bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur te /
translated: Since one who sees the meaning of reality becomes free of afflictions, one finds the means of being indefatigable.

original: shin tu zab cing rgya che ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu zab cing rgya che ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The power of the buddhas and bodhisattvas is inconceivable because it is extremely profound and vast.

original: rgyu rnam pa lngas mthu bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: rgyu rnam pa lngas mthu bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya ste /
translated: It should be understood as inconceivable through five causes:

original: sems can thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir dang / 'jig rten gyi dpe thams cad las 'das pa'i phyir dang / de'i mthu rnams legs par dpyod pa'i las byas pa'i sems tsam dang / @78a * //
analyzed: sems can thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir dang / 'jig rten gyi dpe thams cad las 'das pa'i phyir dang / de'i mthu rnams legs par dpyod pa'i las byas pa'i sems tsam dang / @78a * //
translated: because it transcends all sentient beings, because it transcends all mundane examples, because it is the mere mind that has performed the function of properly investigating those powers,

original: rab tu 'brel ba'i phyir dang / mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa ba'i sems kyis bsgrub par dka' ba'i phyir dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i sa pa'i sems dang rab tu 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab tu 'brel ba'i phyir dang / mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa ba'i sems kyis bsgrub par dka' ba'i phyir dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i sa pa'i sems dang rab tu 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is very closely related to the latter, because it is difficult to achieve by a mind that is not concentrated, and because it is closely related to the mind that is concentrated.

original: mdor bsdu na byang chub sems dpa'i mthu ni rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste /
analyzed: mdor bsdu na byang chub sems dpa'i mthu ni rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste /
translated: In brief, the power of the bodhisattva should be recognized as threefold:

original: ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i mthu ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i mthu ste /

analyzed: yangs shing rgya che la zab pa'i mngon par shes pa drug go //

original: bsod nams dang chos kyi mthu ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go //
analyzed: bsod nams dang chos kyi mthu ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go //
translated: The power of merit and direct intuition is the supramundane perfections.

original: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi mthu ni 'bras bu'i khyad par gyis bsdus pa ste gsum pa'o //
analyzed: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi mthu ni 'bras bu'i khyad par gyis bsdus pa ste gsum pa'o //

analyzed: de la mthu dang po gang yin pa de yang rnam pa gsum du bstan par bya'o //

original: rten nyid dang / ngo bo nyid dang / sbyor ba'i las kyi sbyor ba nyid do //
analyzed: rten nyid dang / ngo bo nyid dang / sbyor ba'i las kyi sbyor ba nyid do //
translated: the very basis, the very nature, and the very application of the activity of application.

original: ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pa ni mkhas pa bdun gyis ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pa yin par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pa ni mkhas pa bdun gyis ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pa yin par rig par bya ste /
translated: One who has attained mastery of concentration should be known as one who has attained mastery of concentration through seven skills.

original: ting nge 'dzin la mkhas pa dang / gnas pa la mkhas pa dang / ldang ba la mkhas pa dang / mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa dang / spyod yul la mkhas pa dang / 'phel ba la mkhas pa dang / 'grib pa la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la mkhas pa dang / gnas pa la mkhas pa dang / ldang ba la mkhas pa dang / mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa dang / spyod yul la mkhas pa dang / 'phel ba la mkhas pa dang / 'grib pa la mkhas pa'o //
translated: The skill in concentration, the skill in abiding, the skill in rising, the skill in accomplishment, the skill in range, the skill in increase, and the skill in decrease.

original: yang ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: yang ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: Again, one who has attained mastery of concentration has three kinds of mastery:

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi dri ma ring du byas pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa ring du byas pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par thob pa nyid do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi dri ma ring du byas pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa ring du byas pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par thob pa nyid do //
translated: the mastery of the purification of the stain of concentration, the mastery of the purification of the secondary defilement of concentration, and the mastery of the attainment of the distinction of concentration.

original: yang gsum ste /
analyzed: yang gsum ste /
translated: Again, there are three kinds:

original: myur ba dang / dus ring du dang / ma tshang ba med pa'o //
analyzed: myur ba dang / dus ring du dang / ma tshang ba med pa'o //
translated: the quick, the long-term, and the complete.

original: mthu'i ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mthu'i ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate the nature of power, he says:

original: 'dod pa tsam gyis don thams cad 'grub pa zhes bya ba ni don thams cad 'grub pa nyid ni ji ltar 'dod pa mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa tsam gyis don thams cad 'grub pa zhes bya ba ni don thams cad 'grub pa nyid ni ji ltar 'dod pa mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The accomplishment of all aims just as one wishes is the accomplishment of all aims just as one wishes.

original: sems shin tu yongs su bsgoms pa nyid ni las su rung bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni go rims so //
analyzed: sems shin tu yongs su bsgoms pa nyid ni las su rung bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni go rims so //
translated: The complete purification of mind is the attainment of mastery over meditative concentration, because one becomes fit for action.

original: 'jig rten thams cad las shin tu yang dag par 'das pas na 'phags pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad las shin tu yang dag par 'das pas na 'phags pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúnoble‚Äù means that one has transcended the entire world.

original: chos rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: chos rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The word ‚Äúphenomena‚Äù refers to generosity and so forth.üîΩThe great result is the extremely pure and extremely vast evolutionary development.

original: 'bras bu chen po ni rnam par smin pa shin tu gya nom pa dang / shin tu rgya che ba nyid des byang chub @78b sems dpa' bde ba nye bar len pa'i rgyu la sogs pa'i bye brag 'thob pa'o //

analyzed: yang mthu thams cad bsdu na mthu rnam pa lngar 'gyur te /

original: mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa'i mngon par shes pa'i mthu dang / sbyin pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mthu dang / rang bzhin gyis skye ba dran pa la sogs pa ngo bo nyid kyis grub pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par rnams dang ldan pas lhan cig skyes pa'i mthu'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa'i mngon par shes pa'i mthu dang / sbyin pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mthu dang / rang bzhin gyis skye ba dran pa la sogs pa ngo bo nyid kyis grub pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par rnams dang ldan pas lhan cig skyes pa'i mthu'o //

original: 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'am /
analyzed: 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'am /
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúHere, the TathƒÅgata or

analyzed: sems la dbang thob pa'i mngon par shes pa'i mthu zhes bya ba bstan pa yin no //

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang dbang ma thob pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs las bye brag tu phye ba'i phyir smras pa /

analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par gnas pa'i dbang du byas nas /

analyzed: de'i phyir smras pa /

analyzed: gal te rtsva dang lo ma dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: sra ba dang / mkhregs pa dang / brtan pa dang / rgya che ba dang / yangs pa rnams kyang yongs su bsgyur bar byed pa bstan pa'i phyir smras pa /
translated: In order to demonstrate the transformation of hard, solid, firm, extensive, and vast things, he says:üîΩIf he wishes to transform the king of mountains, Meru,
